com.shipdream.lib.poke

Class Provider<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shipdream.lib.poke.Provider<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProviderByClassName

    public abstract class Provider<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provider controls the injection type mapping as well as the scope by associated ScopeCache.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Provider.OnFreedListener
      Listener will be called when the given provider is not referenced by any objects.
      static interface  Provider.OnInjectedListener<T>
      Listener monitoring when the provider is referenced for the first time

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Provider(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Construct non-overriding provider without qualifier
      Provider(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.annotation.Annotation qualifier)
      Construct provider with given qualifier and indicates if it's a overriding provider.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Override to implement how the provider instantiates a new instance

    • Constructor Detail

      • Provider

        public Provider(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Construct non-overriding provider without qualifier
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the instance the provider is providing

      • Provider

        public Provider(java.lang.Class<T> type,
        java.lang.annotation.Annotation qualifier)
        Construct provider with given qualifier and indicates if it's a overriding provider. Overriding provider always overrides the existing one and last one wins.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the instance the provider is providing
        qualifier - Qualifier

    • Method Detail

      • getQualifier

        public java.lang.annotation.Annotation getQualifier()
        Get qualifier of the provider
        Returns:
        The qualifier

      • setScopeCache

        public void setScopeCache(ScopeCache scopeCache)
        Sets ScopeCache.
        Parameters:
        scopeCache - Null when provider is not scoped otherwise the ScopeCache.

      • findCachedInstance

        public T findCachedInstance()
        Get the cached instance of this provider if there is a cache associated with this provider and the instance is cached already. Note that, the method will NOT increase reference count of this provider
        Returns:
        The cached instance of this provider if there is a cache associated with this provider and the instance is cached already, otherwise null will be returned

      • registerOnInjectedListener

        public void registerOnInjectedListener(Provider.OnInjectedListener<T> listener)
        Register listener which will be called back when the instance is injected. It will called until all injectable fields of the object are fully and recursively if needed injected.

      • unregisterOnInjectedListener

        public void unregisterOnInjectedListener(Provider.OnInjectedListener<T> listener)
        Unregister listener which will be called back when the instance is injected.

      • type

        public final java.lang.Class<T> type()
        Type of the contract/interface
        Returns:
        The type of the provider

      • createInstance

        protected abstract T createInstance()
                             throws ProvideException
        Override to implement how the provider instantiates a new instance
        Returns:
        The newly created instance
        Throws:
        ProvideException
